django.contrib.gis.geos.coordseq
================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.geos.coordseq

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module houses the GEOSCoordSeq object, which is used internally
   by GEOSGeometry to house the actual coordinates of the Point,
   LineString, and LinearRing geometries.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.geos.coordseq.GEOSCoordSeq


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: GEOSCoordSeq(ptr, z=False)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.geos.base.GEOSBase`


   The internal representation of a list of coordinates inside a Geometry.


   .. py:attribute:: ptr_type


   .. py:method:: getOrdinate(dimension, index)

      Return the value for the given dimension and index.



   .. py:method:: setOrdinate(dimension, index, value)

      Set the value for the given dimension and index.



   .. py:method:: getX(index)

      Get the X value at the index.



   .. py:method:: setX(index, value)

      Set X with the value at the given index.



   .. py:method:: getY(index)

      Get the Y value at the given index.



   .. py:method:: setY(index, value)

      Set Y with the value at the given index.



   .. py:method:: getZ(index)

      Get Z with the value at the given index.



   .. py:method:: setZ(index, value)

      Set Z with the value at the given index.



   .. py:property:: size

      Return the size of this coordinate sequence.


   .. py:property:: dims

      Return the dimensions of this coordinate sequence.


   .. py:property:: hasz

      Return whether this coordinate sequence is 3D. This property value is
      inherited from the parent Geometry.


   .. py:method:: clone()

      Clone this coordinate sequence.



   .. py:property:: kml

      Return the KML representation for the coordinates.


   .. py:property:: tuple

      Return a tuple version of this coordinate sequence.


   .. py:property:: is_counterclockwise

      Return whether this coordinate sequence is counterclockwise.
